Gojek is an equal opportunity workplace that is committed to diversity and inclusion. At Gojek we celebrate our differences, because we believe that diversity not only creates a healthier work environment for our employees, but also helps our business thrive. 



About us

Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!
lever.description: As part of our security operations function, we need an experienced SIEM Usecase & SOAR Specialist that can expertly architect and design use case detections on suspicious activity within the cloud, network, systems, endpoint and applications. This can involve identification of complex and advanced persistent threats (APTs), known and unknown threats including possible zero-day exploits, data leakage and user behaviour analysis. The incumbent is also expected to develop elegant solutions to enable detection and response automation of complex problems and apply appropriate technologies while following security engineering best practices.
lever.descriptionPlain: As part of our security operations function, we need an experienced SIEM Usecase & SOAR Specialist that can expertly architect and design use case detections on suspicious activity within the cloud, network, systems, endpoint and applications. This can involve identification of complex and advanced persistent threats (APTs), known and unknown threats including possible zero-day exploits, data leakage and user behaviour analysis. The incumbent is also expected to develop elegant solutions to enable detection and response automation of complex problems and apply appropriate technologies while following security engineering best practices.

lists.content:
• Security Incident Event Management (SIEM) Rule development, Security Orchestration, Automation and Response (SOAR) implementation and Threat Intelligence Platform (TIP) integration to detect and respond to security incidents and anomalies.
  • Identify, monitor and analyze cybersecurity incidents’ trend to build solid detection use cases.
  • Work closely within the SOC monitoring & threat hunting team to understand the battle and to win the war through rigorous and high-quality use cases and response automation.
  • Conduct behavioural analytics, anomaly monitoring and assist in threat hunting exercises to identify unknown and suspicious activity that could lead to a cybersecurity incident.
  • Monitor known threat actors and adversaries that could be a threat to Gojek.
  • Participate in cybersecurity investigations at the network, endpoint, cloud, and dev and production technology stacks.
  • Support operational of vulnerability management program resulting from security assessments, penetration tests, red team exercises.
  • Ability to work independently on your own in a satellite / remote office where team support is dispersed globally and HQ in Jakarta, Indonesia.

• 10+ years of experience in information security with at least 3+ years in developing high-quality use cases with major SIEM platforms with exposure in cyber threat hunting and/or incident response.
  • Experienced in gathering and utilizing intelligence from both internal & external, extracting indicators of compromise (IOC), suspicious patterns, malicious Command & Control IP addresses/domains.
  • Conducting investigations or log analysis within the cloud and SaaS platforms (eg AWS, GCP, O365, G Suite, etc).
  • Exposure with major SOAR platform development (playbooks, integrations, actions and fine-tuning) and threat Intelligence Platform (TIP) integration with major SIEM platforms.
  • Experience in automation and scripting (Linux shell, Python, Go, Perl, Javascript, Powershell).
  • Experienced in developing using Log Search (ELK, Splunk, etc).

• Think like both an attacker and defender to identify complex and credible cyber threats, and work with relevant teams to take the right and timely actions to analyze, respond and neutralise attacks.
  • As an outcome of understanding the security detection and automation landscape, provide recommendations to build secure infrastructure to prevent future attacks with similar TTPs.
  • Provide insight into business risk assessments of cyber threats and technical vulnerabilities.
  • Working knowledge of Host-based security investigation (Windows, Linux, Network/Security appliances) or mobile OS (Android and IOS) based security investigation a bonus.
  • Current understanding of Operating IPS/IDS, Network Monitoring solutions, Net flow collector and related techniques.
  • Current understanding of Operating EDR (Endpoint Detection and Response) systems and tools such as CarbonBlack, CrowdStrike, EnCase-EDR, FTK, Volatility memory forensic, etc.
  • Knowledge of application security such as Web application, Mobile app traffics, etc.
  • Knowledge of Web Services (HTTP, HTML, AWS, REST, SOAP, Atom).
  • Certified in one or more of the following: CISSP, CISA, CCNA, CISM, SANS GIAC
  • Ability to be flexible and work during non-business hours (to support a global team in different time zones).
